body_html:
All transitive fanin nodes of target nodes should be copied/replicated for all GPUs. I think Conv2D is very likely to be in the transitive fanin and therefore should be replicated. Could you give more details on this and debug the AutoParallel code a bit to find out why it is not replicated?

I'm aware of the simple_placer issue and will work on a fix. For now, a temporary workaround is
config_proto = tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True)

Yes, I will submit an example on ptb RNN model soon.
